title: [Large-scale] Knowledge Management Design Capability Development for Organizational Learning Culture Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational work processes and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for science professionals to learn integrated learning design and knowledge management strategies for building organization-wide knowledge-sharing systems.

learning_goals: Learners can write organization-tailored knowledge management system (KMS) design documents based on learning design principles.
Learners can establish knowledge dissemination strategies using 5-minute microlearning modules applicable in mobile environments.
Learners can propose methods to link organizational learning culture diagnostic tools with performance metrics through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
